issue.title: [CF 1108] Wind Shear not counting as interrupt spell?
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. I use the icon below to track interrupts in an interrupt rotation, namely, I put a player's name in who is supposed to interrupt right before me.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Usually it works fine, but when I tried to put a shaman's name in, the icon wasn't showing. Though the shaman did successfully interrupt a spell multiple times (as could be seen in logs). Shaman's name was suggested in TMW's tooltip on the right hand side and picked from there, so it wasn't a possible misspelling issue.

I guess as a workaround I could use Spell Cast event and specify spell name each time as well in addition to player's name (haven't tried it yet).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.3.0 r16 (g54a0c0c) - as it shows in game.

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_INTERRUPT_SPELL^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SSourceUnit^SGrandissimo ^SCLEUDur^N3 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SDuration^N1.5 ^SMagnitude^N5 ^SAnimation^SICONSHAKE ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^N2^T ^SFade^b ^SType^SAnimations ^SSizeX^N50 ^SPeriod^N0 ^Sa_anim^N1 ^SImage^S1766 ^SSizeY^N50 ^SAnimation^SICONOVERLAYIMG ^SEvent^SOnShow ^SInfinite^B ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^STMW:textlayout:1Kr7UmB1BFsC ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Red~`"Mine's~`Next"] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^Snone ^SUnit^Sraid ^t^N73011^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien | Imported from CurseForge issue #1108 | Raw

comments.body:
That icon isn't enabled. Icons that aren't enabled won't function. Enable the icon if you want it to function.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry it took so long to re-test it, you're right, looks like I forgot to enable the icon that time. Dumb mistake, so sorry for posting this bug.


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien
